intro: Krynitzkia sparsiflora, commonly known as the sparse-flowered krynitzkia, is a flowering plant native to southern Africa. It belongs to the family Aizoaceae, commonly referred to as the ice plant family. The plant is characterized by its small, fleshy leaves and clusters of tiny, star-shaped flowers. It typically grows in rocky or sandy soils and is adapted to arid environments. Krynitzkia sparsiflora is often found in coastal and inland regions with well-drained soils.
